00001 // QuickLZ data compression library
00002 // Copyright (C) 2006-2007 Lasse Mikkel Reinhold
00003 // lar@quicklz.com
00004 //
00005 // QuickLZ can be used for free under the GPL-1 or GPL-2 license (where anything 
00006 // released into public must be open source) or under a commercial license if such 
00007 // has been acquired (see http://www.quicklz.com/order.html). The commercial license 
00008 // does not cover derived or ported versions created by third parties under GPL.
00009 
00010 // Version 1.31 final
00011 #define QLZ_VERSION_MAJOR 1
00012 #define QLZ_VERSION_MINOR 3
00013 #define QLZ_VERSION_REVISION 1
00014 
00015 // Set following flags according to the manual
00016 #define COMPRESSION_LEVEL 0
00017 #define STREAMING_MODE 960000
00018 #define test_rle
00019 #define speedup_incompressible
00020 //#define memory_safe
00021 
00022 // Public functions of QuickLZ
00023 size_t qlz_decompress(const char *source, void *destination, char *scratch);
00024 size_t qlz_compress(const void *source, char *destination, size_t size, char *scratch);

00031 #if (defined(__X86__) || defined(__i386__) || defined(i386) || defined(_M_IX86) || defined(__386__) || defined(__x86_64__) || defined(_M_X64))
00032         #define X86X64

00035 // Compute SCRATCH_COMPRESS, SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS and constants used internally
00036 #if COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0 && defined(memory_safe)
00037         #error memory_safe flag cannot be used with COMPRESSION_LEVEL 0
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #define HASH_ENTRIES 4096
00041 
00042 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0 || COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 1 || COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 2)
00043         #define AND 1
00044 #elif (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 3)
00045         #define AND 0x7
00046 #else
00047         #error COMPRESSION_LEVEL must be 0, 1, 2 or 3
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 #define HASH_SIZE (AND + 1)*HASH_ENTRIES*sizeof(unsigned char *)
00051 
00052 #ifdef STREAMING_MODE
00053         #define STREAMING_MODE_VALUE STREAMING_MODE
00054 #else
00055         #define STREAMING_MODE_VALUE 0
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 #define STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED ((STREAMING_MODE_VALUE >> 3) << 3)
00059 
00060 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL > 1)
00061         #define SCRATCH_COMPRESS HASH_SIZE + STREAMING_MODE_VALUE + 16 + HASH_ENTRIES
00062 #else
00063         #define SCRATCH_COMPRESS HASH_SIZE + STREAMING_MODE_VALUE + 16
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00067         #define SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS HASH_ENTRIES*sizeof(unsigned char *) + 16 + STREAMING_MODE_VALUE
00068 #else
00069         #define SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS 16 + STREAMING_MODE_VALUE
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 int qlz_get_setting(int setting)
00073 {
00074         switch (setting)
00075         {
00076                 case 0: return COMPRESSION_LEVEL;
00077                 case 1: return SCRATCH_COMPRESS;
00078                 case 2: return SCRATCH_DECOMPRESS;
00079                 case 3: return STREAMING_MODE_VALUE;
00080 #ifdef test_rle
00081                 case 4: return 1;
00082 #else
00083                 case 4: return 0;
00084 #endif
00085 #ifdef speedup_incompressible
00086                 case 5: return 1;
00087 #else
00088                 case 5: return 0;
00089 #endif
00090 #ifdef memory_safe
00091                 case 6: return 1;
00092 #else
00093                 case 6: return 0;
00094 #endif
00095                 case 7: return QLZ_VERSION_MAJOR;
00096                 case 8: return QLZ_VERSION_MINOR;
00097                 case 9: return QLZ_VERSION_REVISION;
00098         }
00099         return -1;
00100 }
00101 
00102 __inline unsigned int hash_func(unsigned int i)
00103 {
00104         return ((i >> 12) ^ i) & 0x0fff;
00105 }
00106 
00107 __inline unsigned int fast_read(void const *src, unsigned int bytes)
00108 {
00109 #ifndef X86X64
00110         unsigned char *p = (unsigned char*)src;
00111         switch (bytes)
00112         {
00113                 case 4:
00114                         return(*p | *(p + 1) << 8 | *(p + 2) << 16 | *(p + 3) << 24);
00115                 case 3: 
00116                         return(*p | *(p + 1) << 8 | *(p + 2) << 16);
00117                 case 2:
00118                         return(*p | *(p + 1) << 8);
00119                 case 1: 
00120                         return(*p);
00121         }
00122         return 0;
00123 #else
00124         if (bytes >= 1 && bytes <= 4)
00125                 return *((unsigned int*)src);
00126         else
00127                 return 0;
00128 #endif
00129 }
00130 
00131 __inline void fast_write(unsigned int f, void *dst, unsigned int bytes)
00132 {
00133 #ifndef X86X64
00134         unsigned char *p = (unsigned char*)dst;
00135 
00136         switch (bytes)
00137         {
00138                 case 4: 
00139                         *p = (unsigned char)f;
00140                         *(p + 1) = (unsigned char)(f >> 8);
00141                         *(p + 2) = (unsigned char)(f >> 16);
00142                         *(p + 3) = (unsigned char)(f >> 24);
00143                         return;
00144                 case 3:
00145                         *p = (unsigned char)f;
00146                         *(p + 1) = (unsigned char)(f >> 8);
00147                         *(p + 2) = (unsigned char)(f >> 16);
00148                         return;
00149                 case 2:
00150                         *p = (unsigned char)f;
00151                         *(p + 1) = (unsigned char)(f >> 8);
00152                         return;
00153                 case 1:
00154                         *p = (unsigned char)f;
00155                         return;
00156         }
00157 #else
00158         switch (bytes)
00159         {
00160                 case 4: 
00161                         *((unsigned int*)dst) = f;
00162                         return;
00163                 case 3:
00164                         *((unsigned int*)dst) = f;
00165                         return;
00166                 case 2:
00167 #if COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0
00168 // 2 byte writes are common in level 0
00169                         *((unsigned short int*)dst) = (unsigned short int)f;
00170 #else
00171                         *((unsigned int*)dst) = f;
00172 #endif
00173                         return;
00174                 case 1:
00175                         *((unsigned char*)dst) = (unsigned char)f;
00176                         return;
00177         }
00178 #endif
00179 }
00180 
00181 __inline void memcpy_up(unsigned char *dst, const unsigned char *src, unsigned int n)
00182 {
00183         // cannot be replaced by overlap handling of memmove() due to LZSS algorithm
00184 #ifndef X86X64
00185 
00186         if(n > 8 && src + n < dst)
00187                 memcpy(dst, src, n);
00188         else
00189         {
00190                 unsigned char *end = dst + n;
00191                 while(dst < end)
00192                 {
00193                         *dst = *src;
00194                         dst++;
00195                         src++;
00196                 }
00197         }
00198 #else
00199         if (n < 5)
00200                 *((unsigned int*)dst) = *((unsigned int*)src);
00201         else
00202         {
00203                 unsigned char *end = dst + n;
00204                 while(dst < end)
00205                 {
00206                         *((unsigned int*)dst) = *((unsigned int*)src);
00207                         dst = dst + 4;
00208                         src = src + 4;
00209                 }
00210         }
00211 #endif
00212 }
00213 
00214 __inline unsigned int fast_read_safe(void const *src, unsigned int bytes, const unsigned char *invalid)
00215 {
00216 #ifdef memory_safe 
00217         if ((const unsigned char *)src + 4 > (const unsigned char *)invalid)
00218                 return 0xffffffff;
00219 #endif
00220         invalid = invalid;
00221         return fast_read(src, bytes);
00222 }
00223 
00224 unsigned int qlz_compress_core(const void *source, unsigned char *destination, unsigned int size,  const unsigned char *hashtable[][AND + 1], const unsigned char *first_valid, unsigned char *hash_counter)
00225 {
00226         const unsigned char *source_c = (const unsigned char*)source;
00227         unsigned char *destination_c = (unsigned char*)destination;
00228         const unsigned char *last_byte = source_c + size - 1;
00229         const unsigned char *src = source_c;
00230         unsigned char *cword_ptr = destination_c;
00231         unsigned char *dst = destination_c + 4;
00232         unsigned int cword_val = 1U << 31;
00233         const unsigned char *guarantee_uncompressed = last_byte - 8;
00234 
00235 #ifdef speedup_incompressible
00236                 unsigned char *prev_dst = dst;
00237                 const unsigned char *prev_src = src;
00238 #endif
00239 
00240         hash_counter = hash_counter;
00241         first_valid = first_valid;
00242 
00243         // save first 4 bytes uncompressed
00244         while(src < source_c + 4 && src < guarantee_uncompressed)
00245         {
00246                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1);
00247                 *dst = *src;
00248                 dst++;
00249                 src++;
00250         }
00251         
00252         while(src < guarantee_uncompressed)
00253         {
00254                 unsigned int fetch;
00255                 if ((cword_val & 1) == 1)
00256                 {
00257                         // check if destinationc pointer could exceed destination buffer
00258                         if (dst > destination_c + size)
00259                                 return 0;
00260                                         
00261                         // store control word
00262                         fast_write((cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31), cword_ptr, 4);
00263                         cword_ptr = dst;
00264                         dst += 4;
00265                         cword_val = 1U << 31;
00266 
00267 #ifdef speedup_incompressible
00268                         // check if source chunk is compressible
00269                         if (dst - prev_dst > src - prev_src && src > source_c + 1000)
00270                         {
00271                                 int q;
00272                                 for(q = 0; q < 30 && src + 31 < guarantee_uncompressed && dst + 35 < destination_c + size; q++)
00273                                 {
00274 
00275 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00276                                         int w;
00277                                         for(w = 0; w < 31; w++)
00278                                         {
00279                                                 fetch = fast_read(src + w, 4);
00280                                                 *(unsigned int*)&hashtable[hash_func(fetch)][0] = fast_read(src + w, 4);
00281                                                 hashtable[hash_func(fetch)][1] = src + w;
00282                                         }
00283 #endif
00284                                         fast_write((1U << 31), dst - 4, 4);
00285                                         memcpy(dst, src, 31);
00286 
00287                                         dst += 4*8 - 1 + 4;
00288                                         src += 4*8 - 1;
00289                                         prev_src = src;
00290                                         prev_dst = dst;
00291                                         cword_ptr = dst - 4;
00292                                 }
00293                         } 
00294 #endif
00295                 }
00296 #ifdef test_rle
00297                 // check for rle sequence
00298                 if (fast_read(src, 4) == fast_read(src + 1, 4))
00299                 {
00300                         const unsigned char *orig_src; 
00301                         fetch = fast_read(src, 4);
00302                         orig_src = src;
00303                         do src = src + 4; while (src <= guarantee_uncompressed - 4 && fetch == fast_read(src, 4));
00304                         if((src - orig_src) <= 2047) 
00305                         {                       
00306                                 fast_write(((fetch & 0xff) << 16) | (unsigned int)((src - orig_src) << 4) | 15, dst, 4);
00307                                 dst = dst + 3;
00308                         }
00309                         else
00310                         {
00311                                 fast_write(((fetch & 0xff) << 16) | 15, dst, 4);
00312                                 fast_write((unsigned int)(src - orig_src), dst + 3, 4);
00313                                 dst = dst + 7;
00314                         }
00315                         cword_val = (cword_val >> 1) | (1 << 31);
00316                 }
00317                 else
00318 #endif
00319                 {
00320                         const unsigned char *o;
00321                         unsigned int hash, matchlen;
00322 
00323 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL < 2)
00324                         unsigned int cached;
00325 
00326                         fetch = fast_read(src, 4);
00327                         hash = hash_func(fetch);
00328 
00329                         cached = fetch ^ *(unsigned int*)&hashtable[hash][0];
00330                         *(unsigned int*)&hashtable[hash][0] = fetch;
00331 
00332                         o = hashtable[hash][1];
00333                         hashtable[hash][1] = src;
00334 
00335 #else
00336                         unsigned char c;
00337                         unsigned int k, m;
00338                         const unsigned char *offset2 = 0;
00339                         
00340                         fetch = fast_read(src, 4);
00341                         hash = hash_func(fetch);
00342 
00343                         matchlen = 0;
00344                         c = hash_counter[hash];                 
00345                         for(k = 0; k < AND + 1; k++)
00346                         {
00347                                 o = hashtable[hash][(c - k) & AND];
00348                                 if(o > first_valid && o < src - 3 && *(src + matchlen) == *(o + matchlen) && (fast_read(o, 3) & 0xffffff) == (fetch & 0xffffff) && src - o < 131071)
00349                                 {       
00350                                         size_t remaining;
00351                                         remaining = guarantee_uncompressed - src;
00352                                         m = 3;
00353                                         if (fast_read(o, 4) == fetch)
00354                                         {
00355                                                 while(*(o + m) == *(src + m) && m < remaining)
00356                                                         m++;
00357                                         }
00358                                         if (m > matchlen)
00359                                         {
00360                                                 matchlen = m;
00361                                                 offset2 = o;
00362                                         }
00363                                 }
00364                         }
00365                         o = offset2;                    
00366                         c = (hash_counter[hash] + 1) & AND;
00367                         hash_counter[hash] = c;                 
00368                         hashtable[hash][c] = src;
00369 #endif
00370 
00371 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00372                         if (o != 0 && (cached & 0xffffff) == 0 && src - o > 3)
00373 #elif(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 1)
00374                         if ((cached & 0xffffff) == 0 && o > first_valid && o < src - 3 && ((fast_read(o, 3) ^ fast_read(src, 3)) & 0xffffff) == 0 && src - o < 131071)
00375 #elif(COMPRESSION_LEVEL > 1)
00376                         if(matchlen == 3)
00377 #endif
00378                         {
00379                                 unsigned int offset;
00380                                 offset = (unsigned int)(src - o);
00381                                         
00382 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL < 2)
00383                                 if (cached & 0xffffffff)
00384 #endif
00385                                 {
00386 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL > 2)
00387                                         unsigned int u;
00388                                         for(u = 1; u < 3; u++)
00389                                         {
00390                                                 hash = hash_func(fast_read(src + u, 4));
00391                                                 c = (hash_counter[hash] + 1) & AND;
00392                                                 hash_counter[hash] = c;
00393                                                 hashtable[hash][c] = src + u;
00394                                         }       
00395 #endif
00396 
00397 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)                                    
00398                                         cword_val = (cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31);
00399                                         fast_write(3 | (hash << 4), dst, 2);
00400                                         src += 3;
00401                                         dst += 2;
00402 #else
00403 
00404                                         if(offset <= 63)
00405                                         {
00406                                                 // encode lz match
00407                                                 *dst = (unsigned char)(offset << 2);
00408                                                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31);
00409                                                 src += 3;
00410                                                 dst++;
00411                                         }
00412                                         else if (offset <= 16383)
00413                                         {
00414                                                 // encode lz match
00415                                                 unsigned int f = (offset << 2) | 1;
00416                                                 fast_write(f, dst, 2);
00417                                                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31);
00418                                                 src += 3;
00419                                                 dst += 2;
00420                                         }
00421                                         else
00422                                         {
00423                                                 // encode literal
00424                                                 *dst = *src;
00425                                                 src++;
00426                                                 dst++;
00427                                                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1);
00428                                         }
00429 #endif
00430                                 }               
00431 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL > 1)
00432                         }                                                               
00433                         else if(matchlen > 3)
00434                         {
00435 #elif(COMPRESSION_LEVEL < 2)
00436                                 else
00437 #endif
00438                                 {
00439                                         // encode lz match
00440                                         unsigned int offset;
00441                                         
00442 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL < 2)
00443                                         const unsigned char *old_src = src;
00444                                         offset = (unsigned int)(src - o);
00445                                         cword_val = (cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31);
00446 
00447                                         src += 3;
00448                                         while(*(o + (src - old_src)) == *src && src < guarantee_uncompressed)
00449                                                 src++;
00450                                         matchlen = (unsigned int)(src - old_src);
00451 #else
00452                                         unsigned int u;
00453                                         offset = (unsigned int)(src - o);
00454                                         cword_val = (cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31);
00455 
00456 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL > 2)
00457                                         for(u = 1; u < matchlen; u++)
00458 #else
00459                                         for(u = 1; u < matchlen && u < 5; u++)
00460 #endif
00461                                         {
00462                                                 hash = hash_func(fast_read(src + u, 4));
00463                                                 c = (hash_counter[hash] + 1) & AND;
00464                                                 hash_counter[hash] = c;
00465                                                 hashtable[hash][c] = src + u;
00466                                         }
00467                                         src += matchlen;                        
00468 #endif                                  
00469 
00470 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00471                                         if (matchlen < 15)
00472                                         {
00473                                                 fast_write(matchlen | (hash << 4), dst, 2);
00474                                                 dst += 2;
00475                                         } 
00476                                         else if (matchlen < 255)
00477                                         {
00478                                                 fast_write(hash << 4, dst, 2);
00479                                                 *(dst + 2) = (unsigned char)matchlen;
00480                                                 dst += 3;
00481                                         }
00482                                         else
00483                                         {
00484                                                 fast_write(hash << 4, dst, 2);
00485                                                 *(dst + 2) = 0;
00486                                                 fast_write(matchlen, dst + 3, 4);
00487                                                 dst += 7;
00488                                         }                                       
00489 #else
00490                                         if (matchlen <= 18 && offset <= 1023)
00491                                         {
00492                                                 unsigned int f = ((matchlen - 3) << 2) | (offset << 6) | 2;
00493                                                 fast_write(f, dst, 2);
00494                                                 dst += 2;
00495                                         }
00496 
00497                                         else if(matchlen <= 34 && offset <= 65535)
00498                                         {
00499                                                 unsigned int f = ((matchlen - 3) << 3) | (offset << 8) | 3;
00500                                                 fast_write(f, dst, 3);
00501                                                 dst += 3;
00502                                         }
00503                                         else if (matchlen >= 3)
00504                                         {
00505                                                 if (matchlen <= 2050)
00506                                                 {
00507                                                         unsigned int f = ((matchlen - 3) << 4) | (offset << 15) | 7;
00508                                                         fast_write(f, dst, 4);
00509                                                         dst += 4;
00510                                                 }
00511                                                 else
00512                                                 {
00513                                                         fast_write(7, dst, 4);
00514                                                         fast_write(matchlen, dst + 4, 4);
00515                                                         fast_write(offset, dst + 8, 4);
00516                                                         dst += 12;                                                      
00517                                                 } 
00518                                         }
00519 #endif
00520                                 }
00521                         }
00522                         
00523                         else
00524                         {
00525                                 // encode literal
00526                                 *dst = *src;
00527                                 src++;
00528                                 dst++;
00529                                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1);
00530                         }
00531                 }
00532         }
00533 
00534 // save last source bytes as literals
00535         while (src <= last_byte)
00536         {
00537                 if ((cword_val & 1) == 1)
00538                 {
00539                         fast_write((cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31), cword_ptr, 4);
00540                         cword_ptr = dst;
00541                         dst += 4;
00542                         cword_val = 1U << 31;
00543                 }
00544 
00545                 if (src < last_byte - 2 && src > source_c + 3)
00546                 {               
00547                         hashtable[hash_func(fast_read(src, 4))][1] = src;
00548                         *(unsigned int*)&hashtable[hash_func(fast_read(src, 4))][0] = fast_read(src, 4);
00549                 }
00550                 *dst = *src;
00551                 src++;
00552                 dst++;
00553 
00554                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1);
00555         }
00556 
00557         while((cword_val & 1) != 1)
00558                 cword_val = (cword_val >> 1);
00559 
00560         fast_write((cword_val >> 1) | (1U << 31), cword_ptr, 4);
00561 
00562         // min. size must be 9 bytes so that the qlz_size functions can take 9 bytes as argument
00563         if (dst - destination_c < 9)
00564                 return 9;
00565         else
00566                 return (unsigned int)(dst - destination_c);
00567 }
00568 
00569 size_t qlz_decompress_core(const unsigned char *source, void *destination, size_t size, size_t source_size, unsigned char *first_valid, const unsigned char *hashtable[])
00570 {
00571         const unsigned char *source_c = (const unsigned char*)source;
00572         unsigned char *destination_c = (unsigned char*)destination;
00573         const unsigned char *src = source_c;
00574         unsigned char *dst = destination_c;
00575         const unsigned char* last_byte_successor = destination_c + size;
00576         unsigned int cword_val = 1;
00577         const unsigned int bitlut[16] = {4, 0, 1, 0, 2, 0, 1, 0, 3, 0, 1, 0, 2, 0, 1, 0};
00578         const unsigned char *guaranteed_uncompressed = last_byte_successor - 4;
00579         unsigned char *last_hashed = destination_c + 3;
00580 
00581         first_valid = first_valid;
00582         last_hashed = last_hashed;
00583         hashtable = hashtable;
00584                 
00585         // prevent spurious memory read on a source with size < 4
00586         if (dst >= guaranteed_uncompressed)
00587         {
00588                 src += 4;
00589                 while(dst < last_byte_successor)
00590                 {
00591                         *dst = *src;
00592                         dst++;
00593                         src++;
00594                 }
00595 
00596                 return (unsigned int)(dst - destination_c);
00597         }
00598 
00599 
00600         for(;;) 
00601         {
00602                 unsigned int fetch;
00603 
00604                 if (cword_val == 1)
00605                 {
00606                         // fetch control word
00607                         cword_val = fast_read_safe(src, 4, source_c + source_size) | (1U << 31);
00608                         src += 4;
00609                 }
00610                 
00611                 fetch = fast_read_safe(src, 4, source_c + source_size);
00612 
00613                 // check if we must decode lz match
00614                 if ((cword_val & 1) == 1)
00615                 {
00616                         unsigned int matchlen;
00617 
00618 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00619                         unsigned int hash;
00620                         const unsigned char *offset2;
00621 
00622                         cword_val = cword_val >> 1;                     
00623 
00624                         if((fetch & 0xf) != 15)
00625                         {
00626                                 hash = (fetch >> 4) & 0xfff;
00627                                 offset2 = hashtable[hash];
00628 
00629                                 if((fetch & 0xf) != 0)
00630                                 {
00631                                         matchlen = (fetch & 0xf);
00632                                         src += 2;                       
00633                                 }
00634                                 else if((fetch & 0x00ff0000) != 0)
00635                                 {
00636                                         matchlen = *(src + 2);
00637                                         src += 3;                                                       
00638                                 }
00639                                 else
00640                                 {
00641                                         matchlen = fast_read(src + 3, 4);
00642                                         src += 7;
00643                                 }
00644                                 memcpy_up(dst, offset2, matchlen);
00645                                 while(last_hashed < dst)
00646                                 {
00647                                         last_hashed++;
00648                                         hashtable[hash_func(fast_read(last_hashed, 4))] = last_hashed;
00649                                 }                               
00650                                 dst += matchlen;
00651                                 last_hashed = dst - 1;                          
00652                         }
00653                                 
00654 #else           
00655                         unsigned int offset;
00656                         cword_val = cword_val >> 1;                     
00657 
00658                         if ((fetch & 3) == 0)
00659                         {
00660                                 offset = (fetch & 0xff) >> 2;
00661 #ifdef memory_safe      
00662                                 if (3 > (unsigned int)(guaranteed_uncompressed - dst) || offset > (unsigned int)(dst - first_valid))
00663                                         return 0;
00664 #endif
00665                                 memcpy_up(dst, dst - offset, 3);
00666                                 dst += 3;
00667                                 src++;
00668                         }
00669                         else if ((fetch & 2) == 0)
00670                         {
00671                                 offset = (fetch & 0xffff) >> 2;
00672 #ifdef memory_safe      
00673                                 if (3 > (unsigned int)(guaranteed_uncompressed - dst) || offset > (unsigned int)(dst - first_valid)) 
00674                                         return 0;
00675 #endif
00676                                 memcpy_up(dst, dst - offset, 3);
00677                                 dst += 3;
00678                                 src += 2;
00679                         }
00680                         else if ((fetch & 1) == 0)
00681                         {
00682                                 offset = (fetch & 0xffff) >> 6;
00683                                 matchlen = ((fetch >> 2) & 15) + 3;
00684 #ifdef memory_safe      
00685                                 if (matchlen > (unsigned int)(guaranteed_uncompressed - dst) || offset > (unsigned int)(dst - first_valid)) 
00686                                         return 0;
00687 #endif
00688                                 memcpy_up(dst, dst - offset, matchlen);
00689                                 src += 2;
00690                                 dst += matchlen;
00691                         }
00692                         else if ((fetch & 4) == 0)
00693                         {
00694                                 offset = (fetch & 0xffffff) >> 8;
00695                                 matchlen = ((fetch >> 3) & 31) + 3;
00696 #ifdef memory_safe      
00697                                 if (matchlen > (unsigned int)(guaranteed_uncompressed - dst) || offset > (unsigned int)(dst - first_valid)) 
00698                                         return 0;
00699 #endif
00700                                 memcpy_up(dst, dst - offset, matchlen);
00701                                 src += 3;
00702                                 dst += matchlen;
00703                         }
00704                         else if ((fetch & 8) == 0)
00705                         {
00706                                 offset = (fetch >> 15);
00707                                 if (offset != 0)
00708                                 {
00709                                         matchlen = ((fetch >> 4) & 2047) + 3;
00710                                         src += 4;
00711                                 }
00712                                 else
00713                                 {
00714                                         matchlen = fast_read_safe(src + 4, 4, source_c + source_size);
00715                                         offset = fast_read_safe(src + 8, 4, source_c + source_size);
00716                                         src += 12;
00717                                 }
00718 #ifdef memory_safe      
00719                                 if (matchlen > (unsigned int)(guaranteed_uncompressed - dst) || offset > (unsigned int)(dst - first_valid)) 
00720                                         return 0;
00721 #endif
00722                                 memcpy_up(dst, dst - offset, matchlen);
00723                                 dst += matchlen;
00724                         }
00725 #endif
00726                         else
00727                         {
00728                                 // decode rle sequence
00729                                 unsigned char rle_char;
00730                                 rle_char = (unsigned char)(fetch >> 16);
00731                                 matchlen = ((fetch >> 4) & 0xfff);
00732 
00733                                 if(matchlen != 0)
00734                                         src += 3;
00735                                 else
00736                                 {
00737                                         matchlen = fast_read_safe(src + 3, 4, source_c + source_size);
00738                                         src += 7;
00739                                 }
00740 
00741 #ifdef memory_safe      
00742                                 if(matchlen > (unsigned int)(guaranteed_uncompressed - dst)) 
00743                                         return 0;
00744 #endif
00745                                 memset(dst, rle_char, matchlen);
00746 
00747 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00748                                 while(last_hashed < dst - 1)
00749                                 {
00750                                         last_hashed++;
00751                                         hashtable[hash_func(fast_read(last_hashed, 4))] = last_hashed;
00752                                 }                               
00753                                 last_hashed = dst - 1 + matchlen;
00754 #endif
00755                                 dst += matchlen; 
00756                         }
00757                 }
00758                 else
00759                 {
00760                         // decode literal
00761 #ifdef memory_safe 
00762                         if (4 > destination_c + size - dst || src > source_c + source_size + 4) 
00763                                 return 0;
00764 #endif
00765                         memcpy_up(dst, src, 4);
00766 
00767                         dst += bitlut[cword_val & 0xf];
00768                         src += bitlut[cword_val & 0xf];
00769                         cword_val = cword_val >> (bitlut[cword_val & 0xf]);
00770 
00771 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00772                         while(last_hashed < dst - 3)
00773                         {
00774                                 last_hashed++;
00775                                 hashtable[hash_func(fast_read(last_hashed, 4))] = last_hashed;
00776                         }
00777 #endif
00778                         if (dst >= guaranteed_uncompressed)
00779                         {
00780                                 // decode last literals and exit                                
00781                                 while(dst < last_byte_successor)
00782                                 {
00783                                         if (cword_val == 1)
00784                                         {
00785                                                 src += 4;
00786                                                 cword_val = 1U << 31;
00787                                         }
00788                                         if (1 > destination_c + size - dst)
00789                                                 return 0;
00790 
00791                                         *dst = *src;
00792                                         dst++;
00793                                         src++;
00794                                         cword_val = cword_val >> 1;
00795                                 }
00796 
00797 #if(COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00798                                 while(last_hashed < last_byte_successor - 4)
00799                                 {
00800                                         last_hashed++;
00801                                         hashtable[hash_func(fast_read(last_hashed, 4))] = last_hashed;
00802                                 }
00803 #endif
00804                                 if((src - 1) - source_c > 8) // 8 bytes comp. size excessive len is ok
00805                                         return 0;
00806                                 else if(dst - destination_c - size == 0)
00807                                         return size;
00808                                 else
00809                                         return 0;
00810                         }
00811                 }
00812         }
00813 }
00814 
00815 size_t qlz_size_decompressed(const char *source)
00816 {
00817         unsigned int n, r;
00818         n = (((*source) & 2) == 2) ? 4 : 1;
00819         r = fast_read(source + 1 + n, n);
00820         r = r & (0xffffffff >> ((4 - n)*8));
00821         return r;
00822 }
00823 
00824 size_t qlz_size_compressed(const char *source)
00825 {
00826         unsigned int n, r;
00827         n = (((*source) & 2) == 2) ? 4 : 1;
00828         r = fast_read(source + 1, n);
00829         r = r & (0xffffffff >> ((4 - n)*8));
00830         return r;
00831 }
00832 
00833 size_t qlz_compress(const void *source, char *destination, size_t size, char *scratch)
00834 {
00835         // 1-8 bytes for aligning (not 0-7!); 8 bytes for buffersize (padds on 32 bit cpu); HASH_SIZE hash table; STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED bytes streambuffer; optional HASH_ENTRIES byte hash counter
00836         unsigned char *buffer_aligned = (unsigned char *)scratch + 8 - (((size_t)scratch) % 8);
00837         const unsigned char *(*hashtable)[AND + 1] = (const unsigned char *(*)[AND + 1])(buffer_aligned + 8);
00838         size_t *buffersize = (size_t *)buffer_aligned;
00839         unsigned char *streambuffer = buffer_aligned + 8 + HASH_SIZE;
00840         unsigned int r;
00841         unsigned int compressed, base;
00842         unsigned char *hash_counter = streambuffer + STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED;
00843 
00844         if(size == 0 || size > 0xffffffff)
00845                 return 0;
00846 
00847 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0 && STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED == 0)
00848                 memset((void *)hashtable, 0, HASH_SIZE);
00849 #endif
00850 
00851         if(size < 216)
00852                 base = 3;
00853         else
00854                 base = 9;
00855 
00856 // if not STREAMING_MODE, then STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED == 0 and first case (streaming buffer full) is executed unconditionally, functioning as block comp.
00857         if (*buffersize + size - 1 >= STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED)
00858         {
00859 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0 && STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED != 0)
00860                 memset((void *)hashtable, 0, HASH_SIZE);
00861 #endif
00862 
00863                 r = base + qlz_compress_core(source, (unsigned char*)destination + base, (unsigned int)size, hashtable, (const unsigned char*)source, hash_counter);
00864 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0 && STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED != 0)
00865                 memset((void *)hashtable, 0, HASH_SIZE);
00866 #endif
00867 
00868                 if(r == base)
00869                 {
00870                         memcpy(destination + base, source, size);
00871                         r = (unsigned int)size + base;
00872                         compressed = 0;
00873                 }
00874                 else
00875                         compressed = 1;
00876                 *buffersize = 0;
00877         }
00878         else
00879         {
00880                 memcpy(streambuffer + *buffersize, source, size);
00881                 r = base + qlz_compress_core(streambuffer + *buffersize, (unsigned char*)destination + base, (unsigned int)size, hashtable, streambuffer, hash_counter);
00882 
00883                 if(r == base)
00884                 {
00885                         memcpy(destination + base, streambuffer + *buffersize, size);
00886                         r = (unsigned int)size + base;
00887                         compressed = 0;
00888                                 
00889                         memset((void*)hashtable, 0, HASH_SIZE);
00890                 }
00891                 else
00892                         compressed = 1;
00893                 *buffersize += size;
00894         }
00895         
00896         if(base == 3)
00897         {
00898                 *destination = (unsigned char)(0 | compressed);
00899                 *(destination + 1) = (unsigned char)r;
00900                 *(destination + 2) = (unsigned char)size;
00901         }
00902         else
00903         {
00904                 *destination = (unsigned char)(2 | compressed);
00905                 fast_write(r, destination + 1, 4);
00906                 fast_write((unsigned int)size, destination + 5, 4);
00907         }
00908 
00909 #if (COMPRESSION_LEVEL == 0)
00910                 *destination = (*destination) | 4;
00911 #endif 
00912 
00913         return (size_t)r;
00914 }
00915 
00916 
00917 
00918 size_t qlz_decompress(const char *source, void *destination, char *scratch)
00919 {
00920         // 1-8 bytes for aligning (not 0-7!); 8 bytes for buffersize (padds on 32bit cpu); STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED streambuffer; HASH_SIZE hash table
00921         unsigned char *buffer_aligned = (unsigned char *)scratch + 8 - (((size_t)scratch) % 8);
00922         size_t *buffersize = (size_t *)buffer_aligned;
00923         unsigned int headerlen = 2*((((*source) & 2) == 2) ? 4 : 1) + 1; // get header len
00924 
00925         unsigned char *streambuffer = buffer_aligned + 8;
00926         const unsigned char **hashtable = (const unsigned char **)(streambuffer + STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED);
00927 
00928         size_t dsiz = qlz_size_decompressed((char *)source);
00929         size_t csiz = qlz_size_compressed((char *)source);
00930         if (*buffersize + qlz_size_decompressed((char *)source) - 1 >= STREAMING_MODE_ROUNDED) 
00931         {       
00932                 if((*source & 1) == 1)          
00933                         qlz_decompress_core((const unsigned char *)source + headerlen, destination, dsiz, csiz, (unsigned char*)destination, hashtable);
00934                 else
00935                         memcpy(destination, source + headerlen, dsiz);
00936                 *buffersize = 0;
00937         }
00938         else
00939         {
00940                 if((*source & 1) == 1)
00941                         qlz_decompress_core((const unsigned char *)source + headerlen, streambuffer + *buffersize, dsiz, csiz, streambuffer, hashtable);
00942                 else            
00943                         memcpy(streambuffer + *buffersize, source + headerlen, dsiz);
00944                 memcpy(destination, streambuffer + *buffersize, dsiz);
00945                 *buffersize += dsiz;
00946         }
00947         return dsiz;
00948 }
